subtitle: Mackerel is a delicious oily fish.

method.text: Preheat grill. Brush fish lightly with olive oil. Season.
Grill for 4 min each side or until golden on both sides.
Meanwhile, make sauce: Heat together apple and spinach puree and stir in yogurt. Check taste and season well.
Top the mackerel with spinach and apple puree.

title: Grilled mackerel with apple, spinach and yogurt sauce
